verses.name: 1 Samuel 26:12
verses.text: So David took the spear and the cruse of water from Saul’s bolster; and they gat them away, and no man saw it, nor knew it, neither awaked: for they were all asleep; because a deep sleep from the Lord was fallen upon them.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 26:13
verses.text: Then David went over to the other side, and stood on the top of an hill afar off; a great space being between them:

verses.name: 1 Samuel 26:14
verses.text: And David cried to the people, and to Abner the son of Ner, saying, Answerest thou not, Abner? Then Abner answered and said, Who art thou that criest to the king?
